rules.name: The Red Thirst
rules.lore: Though they strive to restrain it, the murderous ferocity of the Blood Angels simmers beneath the surface of their thoughts. In battle, this rage drives them towards the foe and lends great strength to their blows.
rules.text: Whenever a friendly +Adeptus Astartes+ makes a Charge move, all of its melee weapons gain +1 Attacks and +2 Strength until the end of its Activation.

spells.name: Rage-Fuelled Warrior
spells.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, melee weapons by models in the unit have +[Sustained Hits 3]+

spells.name: Icon of the Angel
spells.effect: Select an enemy unit within 18" that is within Melee Distance of a friendly unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-Shock test.

spells.name: Foresight
spells.effect: Before the end of the Battle Round, this unit may change one Hit roll, Wound roll, or Save roll to an unmodified 6.

strategems.name: Angel's Sacrifice
strategems.when: Whenever one of your +Adeptus Astartes+ +Character+ units is destroyed
strategems.target: The enemy unit that just destroyed your +Character+ unit.
strategems.effect: For the rest of the battle, your units may re-roll their Hit roll against the target enemy unit.

strategems.name: Red Rampage
strategems.effect: The target unit's melee weapons gain +[Lance]+ and +[Lethal Hits]+ until the end of its Activation.
